title: Roasted New Potatoes
directions: 1 Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C). Place potatoes in a large bowl. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, olive oil, rosemary, and garlic. Toss until potatoes are well coated with everything.

2 Spread the potatoes out on a single layer of a roasting pan (a sturdy pan that can take high oven heat, a standard cookie sheet may warp). Roast for 40 minutes, or until potatoes are cooked through and browned. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds of smallish new potatoes (red or yellow skinned), cleaned, cut in half or quarters
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
